publications.title: Dual branch deep learning network for detection and stage grading of diabetic retinopathy
publications.abstract: A deep learning approach to diabetic retinopathy detection and grading. A dual-branch model is trained on a selectively merged and augmented dataset from public sources that significantly enhanced the classification outcomes.
publications.author: H. Shakibania | S. Raoufi | B. Pourafkham | H. Khotanlou | M. Mansoorizadeh

publications.title: CDAN: Convolutional Dense Attention-guided Network for Low-light Image Enhancement
publications.abstract: An autoencoder-based model for enhancing low-light images across challenging lighting conditions.
publications.author: H. Shakibania | S. Raoufi | H. Khotanlou

publications.title: Kernel Correlation Based CNN for Point Cloud Classification Task
publications.abstract: A novel method for processing point cloud data, leveraging adapted kernel correlation techniques to develop a CNN-like approach.
publications.journal: 8th International Conference on Computer and Knowledge Engineering (ICCKE)
publications.author: F. Azizmalayeri | SMM. Peyghambarzadeh | H. Khotanlou; | A. Salarpour
